title: Fast, easy to use
comment: As fast as any fractal generator on android, and one of the better user interfaces

title: Very Cool :
comment: I've always had a love of fractals and definitely love this app.

title: Great fractal app
comment: Amazing all around, you can spend an hour on just one fractal
I'm in love! Seriously, this app is fantastic! Can't believe how quickly it renders. Thank you!
Best fractal generator I have found.

title: Excellent
comment: Works pretty flawlessly. Thanks for such a good app.

title: Need an update:
comment: Nice but slow.  I played with the app but I couldn't generate those awsome images as u see above. So I feel app should have help button get most of app's capabilities.

title: Unbelievably cool.
comment: There are a lot of fractal apps that are more popular_ but there is no good reason why, when this is the absolute best.  Small footprint, highly configurable, fast rendering, stunning results. I think I tested my phone's cpu by zooming in over and over and over until the algorithm broke down and no more fractal depth was possible! I don't dare ask for ability to animate a few seconds as a gif, do I?

title: A must-have for fractal lovers
comment: I would go through withdrawls if I didn't have my Frex. The possibilities are endless, and the pictures render so detailed, it's amazing. There is no limit to the color choices as there is the option to upload your own gradient. The save feature actually works too, which is a biggie for me.  Great app, I want more!!

title: Superb!
comment: Excellent time sink.

title: Forget it
comment: Don't try this app
Nice fractals
An awesome app;works perfectly

title: Excellent Fractal Generator
comment: You really have to dive into the fractals to find the really interesting images.

title: Great job
comment: Now I'm just a guy messing around on his phone but great job here this has entertained me having fun with it and its really great.

title: Amazing app!
comment: As previously stated, Frex is far deeper than it may initially appear. I use several programs as an artist, and this is a valuable tool. I did have an issue with Frex being able to share images, but this was dealt with quickly by the friendly developer on the recent update. 5 stars for Frex!

title: Great program
comment: Works great and fast on my Galaxy S3 tablet. Creates very interesting fractals. Good code and props to the developer.
Thanks! I don't own a tablet. Can you suggest any Frex improvements for tablets?

title: Hidden Depth
comment: Frex is a lot more complex than it first appears to be. There are a limited range of fractals and gradients. It doesn't appear to have the ability to create new or random gradients other than randomly selecting the preset gradients. With practice outstanding results can be achieved. It's very absorbing and time consuming. I haven't checked all of the features. The developer has not really considered what it's for or what it should be used for thus my main criticism is this - ROTATION please. My Great Wave Off Kanagua cannot be rotated. My fairy tale Christmas snow scene is crooked! Fractals are good for generating backgrounds - like Sky, or Snow, or Sea. The result has to look like a stylisation (and that's a big word for me) of something that does exist. Natural fractal forms recreated with Frex. Push it further. Then make a pro version and sell it.
